description: Simple, intuitive and logical every-day-usage additions to the Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0 SP1 and newer. Follows the same namespace structure already found in the .NET Framework.
releaseNotes:
This is a minor release with some improvements prior to the last release.
The following work was completed for this release:

- Refactored the CacheCollection class in the Cuemon.Caching namespace with the goal of a simpler design

- Improved the ActivatorUtility class in the Cuemon namespace to include support for non-public constructors on the CreateInstance methods
- Improved the StringUtility class in the Cuemon namespace to include support for custom-parsers on the IsSequenceOf<T> methods
- Improved the EnumerableUtility class in the Cuemon.Collections.Generic namespace to include a new method; RangeOf<T>
- Improved the InOperator<T> class in the Cuemon.Data namespace to include a ParameterName property that is computed on construct
- Improved the SqlInOperator<T> class in the Cuemon.Data.SqlClient namespace to make use of the ParameterName property
- Improved the CacheCollection class in the Cuemon.Caching namespace to include new methods; GetOrAddAsync<TResult>
- Improved the DoerFactory<TResult> class in the Cuemon namespace to include a new method; EndExecuteMethod
summary: A free and flexible assembly package, built to extend and boost your codebelt - providing vast ways of possibilities for all breeds of coders, programmers, developers and the likes thereof.
title: Cuemon .NET Framework
